channel.title: How would I do this?
channel.description:
Hi, in my server I have this fun fight area, where you fight people, you get automaticly teleblocked, and you cannot logout when you are there, how would I make it so if you are not under attack when you are there, you will get teleported out in 20 seconds. I want to do this, so that people don't get stuck there.
Thanks
Musicmad

item.title: How would I do this?
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Try making like:

public void teleout(){ if(!inCombat == true){ teleportToX = 2438; teleportToY = 5168; } }

I don’t know how to add the timer off hand…
But, add a timer, then do this, maybe with your safe zones?

if(((absY >= ####) && (absY <= ####))){
   teleout();
}

Maybe?

EDIT: I just wrote that up quick, it might not work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

No, that’s not what I posted about.

make a little safe zone with a teleport =)
